group_1.textRight: ...This girl said she had a bad feeling.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... At first we were going to meet up@with you after we evacuated, but...

group_1.textRight: ...What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: ...We might want to rethink our escape plan a bit.
(Something's been feeling off since earlier, but...@Sure enough.)
(It's faint, but this is a Witch...@Kokoro and the others are in danger.)

group_1.textRight: Hey, what are you talking about?@Weren't we gonna get out of here?

group_1.textLeft: (While he may be Kanagi's brother,@I still can't tell him about Witches...)
(I'd prefer to keep him away from it, but if@leaving him behind also risks his safety, then...)
I'll explain later...@Your sweetheart might be in danger.
Kokoro is in danger as well, so I'm@going to help her. What about you?

group_1.textRight: ...And how do you know this?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:350400:cheek_0][chara:350400:lipSynch_1]Intuition.
That being said, intuition is fundamentally@rooted in a person's empiricalâ€•

group_1.textRight: Alright, alright, I get it! I believe you! Let's move!

group_1.textLeft: ...Right. That's very helpful, but how@can you trust me so easily?

group_1.textRight: ...Intuition.

group_1.textLeft: I had a bad feeling, so we turned back.

group_1.textRight: ...So, you wanna explain to me what@the hell is going on with these guys?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's sort of an event for the show...we think?

group_1.textRight: ...An event, really? I thought it was@dangerous to use charcoal indoors...
What now, Masara?

group_1.textLeft: Mitama and the rest must have@noticed the Witch by now,
so we can start with protecting the@victims of the Witch's Kiss here.

group_1.textRight: Got it. But what to do about@Harumi and Sougetsu...

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's use filming arrangements as a@pretext and convince them to move outside.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not sure convincing Sougetsu@will be so easy, though...

group_1.textLeft: Just leave that to me.
...Well, I suppose it is part of the show after all.
How about you go on and head@outside with your girlfriend first?

group_1.textRight: And what about you guys?

group_1.textLeft: ...I need to tend to the man you knocked down.
He doesn't seem to be injured, so hopefully@it'll be fine, but just in case.

group_1.textRight: Ah...shit... I mean, that's@even more reason I should...!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'd prefer if you kept this from your girlfriend,@but...

group_1.textRight: ...What?

group_1.textLeft: We're actually not sure how much of this@is staged, or if the fire is real.
And the only person who knows the whole truth@is probably Ashley herself, I'm afraid.
So I'm asking you right now to keep your@girlfriend safe and escort her outside.
...Let's let those two take care of@the rest and get out of here, Shioya.

group_1.textRight: R-right...!
Nicely done as always, Masara.@...Now, let's do our best too!

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: ...Phew...there we...go.
All the fires have been put out and the windows are@open, and I don't see any more fire hazards around...
I think this'll do for now.
I'm glad that everyone that was kissed@by the Witch is doing all right.

group_1.textLeft: We're lucky that the school was@abandoned and drafty.
An ambulance is on the way as well,@so our work here is about done.

group_1.textRight: ...@[wait:0.8][chara:350402:cheek_0][chara:350402:lipSynch_1]...Hey, Masara.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry that I got mad at you earlier.@...I was too caught up in the competition.
We're already close, we don't need@a fancy title to prove that,
but I wanted us to be number one anyway...@I was missing the point, wasn't I?
Even though it was for my own sake that I wanted@to get to know you better... So I'm sorry!

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm the one who should have been@more attentive to your feelings.
I believe that a mere ranking has no bearing@on the strength of my relationship with you...
But I kept that to myself@and didn't tell you anything.
I'm sorry, Kokoro.
If we had only conveyed our feelings to each other,@this debacle could've all been avoided.

group_1.textRight: Looks like we're still a long way from being able@to call ourselves Kamihama's Closest.

group_1.textLeft: Really?
For me, the closest bond has@always been ours, Kokoro.

group_1.textRight: Ah! That's...yes! I feel the same!
*Giggle* I guess there was no need to compare@ourselves against others in the first place, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Ah! There you two are!@And wait up, who are these people...?
Whoa?! You surprised me!
The people over there were all under a Witch's Kiss.
But they don't seem to have been hurt badly,@and I've called an ambulance.

group_1.textRight: Alright, I'll use my magic to send you both outside,@then.
My Space Fusion can still bridge short distances,
and it should be faster than having to make your@way through the obstacles in the hallways.
We can handle the ambulance and the cleanup here.
I think everyone else should be@fighting the Witch nearby about now,
so when you two get outside,@could you go back them up?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we've got it!@Let's go, Masara!
Looks like they've already made up!
Now c'mon, Shizuku, let's do our best too!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, let's move these people@somewhere easier to find for now.
